section.title: <xar:elseif />
section.t: Contains template code to be executed if all related preceeding <xar:if /> and <xar:elseif /> tag conditions evaluate to false. All instances of <xar:elseif /> attached to <xar:if />must appear before <xar:else />

section.title: Forms
section.t: This tag has only the empty form

t.t: The condition attribute is specified as a PHP expression which should evaluate to false or true. Within the condition attribute, normal php expressions can be used with one exception. When comparing values, the < and > would conflict with XML syntax. See the note on logic tags above for the details.
